name: liquor-locker
description: Liquor Locker is a simple web app to manage personal wine or liquor collections. It supports bottle tracking, tagging, and notes, with a sleek modern UI built for self-hosting and personal consumption tracking.
features: Collection Management: Track bottles, Tagging system, Tasting notes. Organize your wine and spirits.
Inventory Tracking: Bottle locations, Consumption history, Stock levels. Know what you have.
Modern Interface: Clean design, Mobile-friendly, Easy to use. Beautiful collection management.
Tasting Notes: Flavor profiles, Rating system, Personal reviews. Document your experiences.
Bottle Details: Vintage information, Producer data, Purchase history. Complete bottle records.
Location Tracking: Storage locations, Cellar organization, Quick lookup. Find bottles easily.
Consumption History: Drinking log, Occasion notes, Date tracking. Remember special moments.
Search & Filter: Advanced search, Category filters, Quick find. Navigate your collection.
